EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Tasktop - EMEA - 2015.09.01.Email - Invite 1 - Tasktop EMEA
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Combining the power of enterprise software testing with Software Lifecycle Integration enables enterprises to connect their automated testing with development processes to lower business risk and accelerate innovation.
Join Jeff Downs of Tasktop and Gernot Brandl of Tricentis as they share how Tosca Connect, powered by Tasktop Sync:
- Removes the barriers to test automation and - Enables Tosca Testsuite to be seamlessly integrated into your software development
Register now <#> for the free webinar, Leveraging the Power of Tosca Connect and Tasktop Sync, on September 1st, 2015, at 4:00 PM CEST. See you there! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<#>
<#> Tue, Sep 1, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Gernot Brandl Product Manager Tricentis
Jeff Downs Tasktop
